entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 5.
